methods.name: GetTeamMembersAsync
methods.generated_summary: Retrieve the user's regional settings based on their address timezone ID.

params_list.name: teamId
params_list.param_desc: The ID of the team that the user is associated with.

methods.name: GetUserActiveTeamsAsync
methods.generated_summary: Update the user's regional settings based on the provided country code and time zone ID, creating a new user address if necessary.

params_list.name: countryCode
params_list.param_desc: The country code used to update the user's regional settings.

params_list.name: timeZoneId
params_list.param_desc: The time zone ID used to update the user's regional settings.
